author: Geoff Bennett and Monica Alba and Jacob Gardenswartz
title: Hardest-hit states won't follow Trump on reopening
description: Despite President Trump's false assertion that he has "total" authority over American states, governors say they intend to decide how best to reopen economies.
content: WASHINGTON Despite President Donald Trump's false assertion that he has "total" authority over American states, those with the highest number of coronavirus cases and deaths say they don't intend to wait for his decision on restarting the economy and will ins… [+12301 chars]
